definition: to worry/to concern oneself with/worried/anxiety/sorrow/(literary) to observe mourning

sentences.english: McGill believes the city's expansion bodes ill.
sentences.chinese: 麦基尔认为，该城市的扩张前景堪忧。

sentences.english: The second is the calibre of the candidates to become Japan’s next prime minister.
sentences.chinese: 第二，继任首相候选人的能力令人堪忧。

sentences.english: Despite this unprepossessing outlook, the bank envisages a recovery starting by the end of the year.
sentences.chinese: 尽管前景堪忧，央行预测今年年底经济将开始复苏。

sentences.english: Relieve inflammation or internal heat the truth now live eight teacher younger brother, also is the life is grim.
sentences.chinese: 败火直言眼下活着的八位师弟，也是性命堪忧了。

sentences.english: The elevator suddenly fails, party day hills and TongZhiYuan life worrying.
sentences.chinese: 电梯忽然出现故障，方天丘与佟之元性命堪忧。

sentences.english: Today, "My ugly mother" big heat, "Auntie Cloud" worrying prospects.
sentences.chinese: 如今，《我的丑娘》大热，《云婶》前景堪忧。

sentences.english: However, the status of internal control in our listing corporations is uneasy.
sentences.chinese: 然而，我国上市公司的内部控制状况却令人堪忧。

sentences.english: At present, the environment of lakes in the country is worryied.
sentences.chinese: 目前，我国湖泊水体的环境现状令人堪忧。

sentences.english: Now just, stir-fry by heat, " unite to appear on the market " also is prospect can You.
sentences.chinese: 而现在正被热炒的“联合上市”也是前景堪忧。

sentences.english: Yet at both global and national levels, energy is poorlygoverned.
sentences.chinese: 然而在全球和国家两个层面，能源管理问题堪忧。

sentences.english: In the second place, the growing path of the baby is worrying.
sentences.chinese: 第二，婴儿的成长道路实在令人堪忧。

definition: to be underwhelmed/to be less than impressed
to develop rapidly after abrupt turn (idiom); dramatic change
lit. to drop a thousand zhang in one fall (idiom)/fig. (of business, popularity etc) to suffer a sudden, devastating decline/to take a dive
spectacle too horrible to endure (idiom); tragic sight/appalling scenes of devastation
hanging in the balance/the future is hard to forecast/¿Qué serà?/who knows what the future holds?
